product_name: REI Lightweight Merino Wool Hiking Crew Socks
long_description: With naturally wicking fibers, REI Lightweight Merino Wool Hiking Crew Socks are a comfortable choice for the trail. Merino lambswool with nylon and Lycra(R) spandex provides durability and dependable fit. Lightweight cushioning provides added comfort. Stretch nylon reinforces heel and toe area for durability and comfort; arch bands give additional support. Uniquely formed toe area and Lin-Toe(R) ''no-feel'' seams keep socks smooth and nonirritating. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With naturally wicking fibers, REI Lightweight Merino Wool Hiking Crew Socks are a comfortable choice for the trail.
